name: The Quest Trio: Jewels, Cards and Tiles
name_original: The Quest Trio: Jewels, Cards and Tiles
description:
Journey through Africa and Asia matching jewels, tiles and cards! Help Rupert Pack find a legendary jewel board and true love. Restore balance to the world through the matching mahjong tiles. Fortune and glory are in the cards - prepare to embark on an all new adventure!

Features

• 180 challenging jewel puzzles
• 128 mahjong layouts
• Over 114 Tri-Peak layouts
• Rich immersive storylines
